channel.title: Food on Larry's Random Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Food on Larry's Random Ramblings

item.title: Hot Triple Snack Round-Up: Chana Jor Garam, Ghost Pepper Potato Chips, and Hot Shrimp Crackers
item.description: A few trips to different markets and I ‘bagged’ myself a few new snacks to try out. What did I get, and how did they taste?

item.title: Chips of deception - Tteokbokki
item.description: Looked hot…was not. Going by the packaging alone, I expected these to kill my tastebuds, but mild disappointment was all I got.

item.title: The Chips Are On The Table/Hot Tikha Ganthia
